pr_title: CUSTCOM-144 Avoid NPEx on unboxing null Boolean (javaee/glassfish 22406)

timeline.message: Test for NPEx on unboxing null async supported flag

If not set explicitly assume async is not supported and avoid NPEx

Fixes eclipse-ee4j/glassfish 22406

timeline.bodyText: Version and scope are redundant, they are already defined in payara-nucleus-parent, am I right?
